title: Matthew McConaughey Says He Won’t Run for Texas Governor
sub_head: Actor says running for office in his home state is ‘a path that I’m choosing not to take at this moment’
body:
Actor Matthew McConaughey said he won’t run for governor in his home state of Texas after months of publicly considering the idea.
Mr. McConaughey said that he has been contemplating how he can best benefit society, and with that came studying and considering entering politics.
